palette.title: F i v eT h i n g s
palette.description: I should probably apologize to my CL friends for not telling stuff about myself earlier because after sunmeadow passed away I've been thinking how little we actually know about each other.Here are somethings important about me you need to know .Don't forget I'm a lover of blues and reds too. Thanks Gasp for tagging me. I tag twister,ricster and Faeleia ,Tzadkiel and everyone else who likes the game)) Children :I have four.They fill my life with joy and laughter.My girls are my best friends.My sons are my strength.They keep me away from growing and help me be silly and stay that way. Designing:I was born like that although I'm not a professional designer I create my world the way I like it.Everything surrounding me has my touch in it..I love to dress people.Loved style and fashion as long as I can remember. Sea:My first and everlasting love.Waves washing my feet,sea vapor,breeze,sand,sun,seashells...Probably was a mermaid in a previous life)) Friends:Got the best friends in the whole world.They bleed when I am in pain if you know what I mean.Adore them.They are always there for me and so am I for them. Reading:Not much time to read but always pleasure to hold and smell a book ;enjoy being in a library.Have big one at home.
